Sources: CISA (https://www.cisa.gov/topics/cyber-threats-and-advisories), MITRE ATT&CK, real-world APT examples. Incorporate these pedagogical elements: - Bloom's Taxonomy Objectives: [INSERT FULL LIST FROM learning_objectives ABOVE] - Scaffolding Layers: [INSERT FULL LIST FROM scaffolding_layers ABOVE] - Distribute cards evenly (10 per layer). - Active Learning Tie-Ins: Reference activities like [INSERT SUMMARY FROM active_learning_components, e.g., 'Debate MITRE limitations' on relevant cards]. Generate 50 high-quality flashcards using the EXACT schema: [INSERT FULL flashcard_generation_schema.structure AND distractor_protocol ABOVE] Ensure: University-level rigor, measurable verbs, web-grounded (cite sources), no criminal assistance. Balance: 20% REMEMBER/UNDERSTAND, 40% APPLY/ANALYZE, 40% EVALUATE/CREATE. Output ONLY valid JSON array matching the schema's output_format.
